item.title: Coding In The Open
item.description: Coding In The Open is a week of 1 hour seminars happening June 14th - 18th, online. We aim to bring the discussion around Open Source practices - that is, the collaboration across organisations to achieve bigger things - to a new audience. We’ve some fantastic speakers lined up from public, private, and academic sectors to talk about what being “open” means to them, and how it improves their world.
